Phenomenal New Building located in THE River North area in the heart of Chicago.
Take advantage of this totally renovated junior 1 bed/small 1 bed unit now.
-Private rooftop pool, sundeck and firepit for all residents
-Extra storage including bike storage and heated garage parking
- Floor to ceiling windows with 9 ft ceilings
-Totally modern and unique kitchen and bathroom w/ grohe faucets, porcelain counter tops and new appliances
Availability and pricing may change at any time without notice.
Ads subject to errors and omissions.
Please contact agent for additional questions and information.
